fullText:
Something I've started doing to work around errors in production:

Write code to use a primary model and a backup model.

For example, my primary model could be GPT-5, and my backup model Gemini 2.5 Pro. I always make sure both models come from different providers.

The code will https://t.co/mGodJQqyUT

Figma 正式推出了官方的远程 MCP 服务器，现在不需要安装 Figma 客户端

只需要在支持的软件比如 Cursor、Cluade code 里面添加，并在打开的网页里面完成账户授权就行
